site_name: Vacant Land Wilford CloseEnfieldEN2 6AJ
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 19/03493/FUL: external finishing materials (4), surfacing materials (5), landscaping (6), ground levels (8), refuse and recycling storage (9), construction management plan (10), cycle storage (11), SuDS (12). boundary fence (14), solar panels (15), Considerate Constructors Scheme (16), noise levels (17) and s278 (18) in respect of redevelopment of site and erection of a 2-storey block of 5 x self-contained flats, comprising 3 x 1-bed and 2 x 2-bed with cycle parking, refuse storage and landscaping.
